short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Control YouTube playback speed with ease.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Watch YouTube Videos at Your Perfect Speed!

Have you ever wished you could watch YouTube videos faster or slower? Now you can with our super easy Custom Speed Control extension!

What does it do?
This cool tool lets you change how fast or slow YouTube videos play. You can speed things up if you're in a hurry, or slow them down if you want to catch every detail.

How does it work?
• Use simple keyboard shortcuts to change the speed
• Speed up or slow down by 0.25x at a time
• Go as slow as 0.25x or as fast as 16x speed!
• See the current speed right on the YouTube player

Easy to use:

On Windows: Press Alt + Plus to go faster, or Alt + Minus to go slower
On Mac: Use Option + Plus to speed up, or Option + Minus to slow down
Don't like those keys? No problem! You can easily change them:
• Click on the extension icon
• Go to the options page
• Pick any keys you like better

Why you'll love it:
• Learn faster by speeding up educational videos
• Slow down tricky parts in how-to guides
• Binge-watch your favorite shows in less time
• Customize your viewing experience for any video

Perfect for students, busy professionals, or anyone who wants more control over their YouTube watching. Give it a try and see how much time you can save or how much more you can learn!

Install now and take control of your YouTube speed. Happy watching!
